phone_number.description: The phone number that is being verified.

has_csr_coverage.description: Indicates whether the phone number is covered or not.

reason.description: The reason why the phone number is not covered. Only returned if `has_csr_coverage` is false.

additional_data_required.description: Additional data required to perform CSR for the phone number. Only returned if `has_csr_coverage` is true.

record_type.description: Identifies the type of the resource.
